fileContext: This paper introduces vHeat, a novel vision backbone model inspired by heat conduction principles for efficient and robust visual representation learning. The model conceptualizes image patches as heat sources, modeling their correlations as thermal energy diffusion, demonstrating superior performance and efficiency compared to Vision Transformers.

fileContext: This paper introduces a Temporal Shift module (TS-SNN) for Spiking Neural Networks to integrate past, present, and future spike features with minimal computational cost. TS-SNN achieves state-of-the-art performance on CIFAR-10, CIFAR-100, and ImageNet with fewer timesteps while maintaining low energy consumption.
